channel.title: Anti lag
channel.description: ok am usign berky scape its a 508 server and its laggy as hell i wanna know how to add anti lagg to the server

item.title: Anti lag
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bob3 Mr. Bob
item.description:
@Mr_Bob3 wrote:

There’s no such thing as “anti lag”

You need to work on optimizing the server, the host machine, and runtime settings.

Also check if anything is causing the server to use a large amount of memory (like rapid 1 millisecond checking which I apparently found in a lot of servers)

Note that your server should run at 600 millisecond intervals and near everything is done at this rate as well.

Read full topic
